original_text: And by him shall be the tribe of Manasseh: and the captain of the children of Manasseh shall be Gamaliel the son of Pedahzur.
korean_text: 그 곁에는 므낫세 지파가 있을 것이라 므낫세 자손의 지휘관은 브다술의 아들 가말리엘이요

sentences.original_text: And by him shall be the tribe of Manasseh:
sentences.korean_translation: 그에 의해 므낫세 지파가 있을 것이며:

sentences.original_text: and the captain of the children of Manasseh
shall be Gamaliel the son of Pedahzur.
